name: Wreckt
description:
Join us in shaping the future of Wreckt, an high-intensity multiplayer battle arena game in the Sandbox metaverse! By contributing to our fundraising campaign, you'll be supporting the further development of the game, including the creation of a collection of 10000 unique 3D avatars. But that's not all, your contribution will also help us build and strengthen our community.

With your support, we'll be able to bring new features and improvements to the game, making it an even more exciting and immersive experience for players. We'll also be able to give back to our community by providing exclusive perks and experiences to our contributors. And by contributing, you'll also be getting the chance to own a piece of the Wreckt world with our unique NFT collection of 10000 3D avatars.

So don't wait, be a part of our community and contribute to our fundraising campaign today. You'll be supporting the creation of an exciting and one-of-a-kind game, and also gain access to unique perks and experiences that only our contributors will have access to. Click on the link and help us build a brighter future for Wreckt and its community!
payDisclosure: As a supporter of this project, I acknowledge that this project is still in development. I am aware that there is a risk that the project will not go ahead and that I will lose all or part of my donation as a result.
